sentences.english: Do we have to pre-book tours, or can we get them on-site?
sentences.chinese: 我们是必须事先预定旅行，还是可以到那儿再说？

sentences.english: She needs to ask for the squad leader’s permission when she wants to go to the washroom.
sentences.chinese: 就连去洗手间，她都需要事先征得班长的同意。

sentences.english: I did not know they wanted pens.
sentences.chinese: 但我事先不知道他们竟然会缺笔。

sentences.english: I have to tell him in advance.
What are you, birdlings, who eat the pre-chewed food their mother chokes up?
sentences.chinese: 你们是什么，是吃着母亲事先咀嚼过的食物的雏鸟吗？

sentences.english: The deemed method may not be used before an enterprise commences operations.
sentences.chinese: 要禁止在企业生产经营开始之前采取事先核定的办法。

sentences.english: For example, pre-select the user’s country based on their IP address.
sentences.chinese: 例如，根据用户的IP地址事先选定其国家。

sentences.english: You'd better mark a white line there beforehand.
sentences.chinese: 你最好事先在那里划一条白线。

sentences.english: By the way, it requires that you already have Snow Leopard.
sentences.chinese: 顺便提一句，它要求你已事先安装了“雪豹”系统。

sentences.english: The more slap-up the restaurant is, the more necessary to preengage.
sentences.chinese: 越高档的饭店越需要事先预约。

sentences.english: He has carefully planted the surprise word.
sentences.chinese: 他已经事先准备好惊人之语了。

sentences.english: I am preinclined to accept his apology.
sentences.chinese: 我事先已有意接受他的道歉。

sentences.english: The dynamite and the fuses are strapped along sticks of bamboo before being shoved into pre-drilled holes.
sentences.chinese: 炸弹和引信绑在长竹竿上，放入事先砖好的洞里。

sentences.english: I answer with prearranged hand signals.
sentences.chinese: 我用事先安排好的手势作答。

sentences.english: Setup pre-flight testing builds for developers.
sentences.chinese: 为开发人员设置事先准备好的测试构建。

sentences.english: S0 you didn't know that before hand, did you?
sentences.chinese: 那么你事先并不知道这件事，对吧。

definition: to shift to an earlier date/to do sth ahead of time/in advance
ahead of schedule/sooner than planned/to bring forward (to an earlier time)
preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
